B

Bet - Class in hippodrome.actions
Representation of a bet, which is done on the BettingCentre.
Bet(int, int) - Constructor for class hippodrome.actions.Bet
Creates a bet, given an identification horseJockeyId and an amount of money money.
BETTING_CENTRE_HOST - Static variable in class configurations.ServerConfigurations
Definition of the Betting Centre host for the execution.
BETTING_CENTRE_NAME - Static variable in class configurations.RMIConfigurations
Name of the Betting Centre hippodrome region on RMI Registry.
BETTING_CENTRE_PORT - Static variable in class configurations.ServerConfigurations
Definition of the Betting Centre port for the execution.
BETTING_CENTRE_TIME_TO_SLEEP - Static variable in class configurations.ServerConfigurations
Definition of the Betting Centre time to sleep for the execution.
BettingCentre - Class in hippodrome
Place where the Spectators place their bets on the winning horse.
BettingCentre(GeneralInformationRepositoryInterface, int, int) - Constructor for class hippodrome.BettingCentre
Creates a Betting Centre.
BettingCentreInterface - Interface in hippodrome
Interface of the place where the Spectators place their bets on the winning horse.
bind(String, Remote) - Method in interface registry.Register
Binds a remote reference to the specified name in this registry.
bind(String, Remote) - Method in class registry.RegisterRemoteObject
Binds a remote reference to the specified name in this registry.
Broker - Class in entities
Implementation of a Entities, an essential character on a horse race action.
Broker(int, BettingCentreInterface, ControlCentreInterface, RacingTrackInterface, StableInterface, GeneralInformationRepositoryInterface) - Constructor for class entities.Broker
Creates a Entities.
BROKER_HOST - Static variable in class configurations.ClientConfigurations
Definition of the Broker port for the execution.
BROKER_PORT - Static variable in class configurations.ClientConfigurations
Definition of the Broker port for the execution.
BrokerState - Enum in entities
Enumeration of all Entities's states, given on its lifecycle.
